languages.text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}Силами Дома Орселлио{/d} души наших предков освободились из оков артефакта ксеносов. Их память и мудрость послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "Силами Дома Орселлио души наших предков освободились из оков артефакта ксеносов. Их память и мудрость послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}Силами Дома Орселлио{/d} души наших предков освободились из оков артефакта ксеносов. Их память и мудрость послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".

Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}奥赛罗家族已经解放了先祖的灵魂{/d}，它们不再被禁锢在异形的造物之中。如今，他们的记忆与智慧将会为我们的家族服务，帮助我们在废墟上打下坚实的地基，荫庇子孙后代。我相信这一点，就像相信帝皇的圣光一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“奥塞罗家族已经解放了先祖的灵魂，它们不再被禁锢在异形的造物之中。如今，他们的记忆与智慧将会为我们的家族服务，帮助我们在废墟上打下坚实的地基，荫庇子孙后代。我相信这一点，就像相信帝皇的圣光一样。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "House Orsellio has seen to it that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

languages.text: {n}Cassia se toca la coraza donde tiene el Atlas.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}La casa Orsellio se ha ocupado{/d} de que las almas de nuestros antepasados sean libres de su prisión en el artefacto xenos. Sus recuerdos y su sabiduría servirán a la casa ayudando a edificar sobre las ruinas del presente, sentando unas bases firmes para las generaciones futuras. Lo creo tanto como creo en la luz divina del Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se toca la coraza donde tiene el Atlas.{/n} «La casa Orsellio se ha ocupado de que las almas de nuestros antepasados sean libres de su prisión en el artefacto xenos. Sus recuerdos y su sabiduría servirán a la casa ayudando a edificar sobre las ruinas del presente, sentando unas bases firmes para las generaciones futuras. Lo creo tanto como creo en la luz divina del Emperador».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}オーセリオ家は、祖先の魂が異種族のアーティファクトの中から解放されるのを見届けました{/d}。彼らの記憶と知恵は我が家に役立ち、現在の廃墟の上に、来るべき世代のための強固な基盤を築く助けとなるでしょう。皇帝の神聖な光を信じるように、私はそれを信じています」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}オーセリオ家は、祖先の魂が異種族のアーティファクトの中から解放されるのを見届けました{/d}。彼らの記憶と知恵は我が家に役立ち、現在の廃墟の上に、来るべき世代のための強固な基盤を築く助けとなるでしょう。皇帝の神聖な光を信じるように、私はそれを信じています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte, wo sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Das {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}Haus Orsellio hat dafür gesorgt{/d} , dass die Seelen unserer Ahnen aus ihrer Gefangenschaft in dem Xenos-Artefakt befreit werden. Ihre Erinnerung und ihre Weisheit werden unserem Haus dienen, werden uns helfen, auf den Ruinen der Gegenwart ein festes Fundament für kommende Generationen zu errichten. Daran glaube ich ebenso fest wie ich an das göttliche Licht des Imperators glaube."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte, wo sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Das Haus Orsellio hat dafür gesorgt, dass die Seelen unserer Ahnen aus ihrer Gefangenschaft in dem Xenos-Artefakt befreit werden. Ihre Erinnerung und ihre Weisheit werden unserem Haus dienen, werden uns helfen, auf den Ruinen der Gegenwart ein festes Fundament für kommende Generationen zu errichten. Daran glaube ich ebenso fest wie ich an das göttliche Licht des Imperators glaube."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}La maison Orsellio a veillé{/d} à libérer les âmes de nos ancêtres du confinement de l'artefact xénos. Nous mettrons leurs souvenirs et leur sagesse au service de notre maison, afin de bâtir sur les ruines du présent des fondations solides pour les générations futures. C'est ma conviction, aussi forte que ma foi en la lumière divine de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « La maison Orsellio a veillé à libérer les âmes de nos ancêtres du confinement de l'artefact xénos. Nous mettrons leurs souvenirs et leur sagesse au service de notre maison, afin de bâtir sur les ruines du présent des fondations solides pour les générations futures. C'est ma conviction, aussi forte que ma foi en la lumière divine de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}Orsellio Hanesi sayesinde{/d} atalarımızın ruhları, hapsoldukları zeno eserinden kurtuldu. Atalarımızın anıları ve bilgeliği sayesinde Hanemizin gelişmesiyle, gelecek nesiller için günümüzdeki yıkıntıların üzerine sağlam temeller atılacak. Buna inancım, İmparator'un nuruna inancım kadar sağlam."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_NaviClearSoulstone}House Orsellio has seen to it{/d} that the souls of our ancestors are freed from their confinement inside the xenos artefact. Their memory and wisdom will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Orsellio Hanesi, atalarımızın ruhlarının hapsoldukları zeno eserinden kurtulmasını sağladı. Atalarımızın anıları ve bilgeliği sayesinde Hanemizin gelişmesiyle, gelecek nesiller için günümüz harabelerinin üzerine sağlam temeller atılacak. Bu inancım, İmparator'un nuruna inancım kadar sağlam."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
